content.prompt: Which of the following is an implication of the argument in the passage?

choices.label: If Obrador wins the election, citizens will have less influence in government.
If Obrador wins the election, Mexico will become a consolidated democracy.
If Obrador loses the election, businesses and the Mexican economy will suffer.
If Obrador loses the election, basic services for many Mexican citizens will end.

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain how the implications of the author's argument or perspective may affect political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
